summary: Comprehensive testing of CompassX Sales Engagement CRM - Backend APIs and Frontend UI tested successfully. All core functionality working except minor logout UI issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Logout functionality not visible in UI - no logout button or link found in sidebar or user profile area
ui_bugs.note: Backend /api/auth/logout endpoint works correctly, but UI doesn't provide access to it

passed_tests: Frontend - Navigation (Organizations, Contacts, Activities, Reports, Executive)
Frontend - AI Copilot Features (Summarize, Suggest Activity)
action_item_for_main_agent: Add logout functionality to the UI - need to include a logout button/link in the sidebar navigation or user profile area to allow users to sign out
